data.name: CreateCashReceiptDetailStatHistory
ReadCashReceiptDetailCashReceiptDetailStatHistory1
data.value: select top(1) T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER, T1.CST_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRD_ID, T1.COURT_ORDER_NUMBER, T1.CASE_NUMBER, T1.RECEIVED_AMOUNT, T1.COLLECTION_AMOUNT, T1.COLLECTION_DATE, T1.OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T1.REFUNDED_AMT, T1.DISTRIBUTED_AMT, T1.COLLAMT_APPL_IND, T2.CDS_IDENTIFIER, T2.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T2.REASON_CODE_ID, T2.CREATED_BY, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T2.REASON_TEXT, T3.CODE, T3.NAME, T3.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T3.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T3.CREATED_BY, T3.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T3.LAST_UPDATE_BY, T3.LAST_UPDATE_TMST, T3.DESCRIPTION from CKT_CR_DETAIL_STAT T3 join CKT_CR_DETAIL T1 join CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST T2 on (T1.CRD_ID = @crdId) and (T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (T1.CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (T1.CRD_ID = T2.CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CST_IDENTIFIER = T2.CST_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate) on T3.CRDETAIL_STAT_ID = T2.CDS_IDENTIFIER

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailCashReceiptDetailStatHistory2
data.value: select T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER, T1.CST_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER, T1.CRD_ID, T1.COURT_ORDER_NUMBER, T1.CASE_NUMBER, T1.RECEIVED_AMOUNT, T1.COLLECTION_AMOUNT, T1.COLLECTION_DATE, T1.OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T1.REFUNDED_AMT, T1.DISTRIBUTED_AMT, T1.COLLAMT_APPL_IND, T2.CDS_IDENTIFIER, T2.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T2.REASON_CODE_ID, T2.CREATED_BY, T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T2.REASON_TEXT, T3.CODE, T3.NAME, T3.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T3.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T3.CREATED_BY, T3.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T3.LAST_UPDATE_BY, T3.LAST_UPDATE_TMST, T3.DESCRIPTION from CKT_CR_DETAIL_STAT T3 join CKT_CR_DETAIL T1 join CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST T2 on (T1.OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR = @oblgorPrsnNbr) and (T1.COLLECTION_DATE >= @collectionDate) and (T1.CRD_ID = T2.CRD_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CRV_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRV_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CST_IDENTIFIER = T2.CST_IDENTIFIER) and (T1.CRT_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRT_IDENTIFIER) and (T2.DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate) and (T2.CREATED_TIMESTAMP < @createdTimestamp) on (T3.CRDETAIL_STAT_ID = T2.CDS_IDENTIFIER) and ( T3.CRDETAIL_STAT_ID in (cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier1 as smallint), cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier2 as smallint), cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier3 as smallint), cast(@systemGeneratedIdentifier4 as smallint)) ) order by T1.COLLECTION_DATE

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatus1
data.value: select top(1) CRDETAIL_STAT_ID, CODE, NAME, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_TMST, DESCRIPTION from CKT_CR_DETAIL_STAT where CRDETAIL_STAT_ID = @crdetailStatId

data.name: ReadCashReceiptDetailStatus2
data.value: select top(1) CRDETAIL_STAT_ID, CODE, NAME, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_TMST, DESCRIPTION from CKT_CR_DETAIL_STAT where CRDETAIL_STAT_ID = @crdetailStatId

data.name: ReadCollectionAdjustmentReason
data.value: select top(1) OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID from CKT_COLL_ADJ_RSN where OB_TRN_RLN_RSN_ID = @obTrnRlnRsnId

data.name: ReadCollectionObligationTypeCsePersonObligor
data.value: select T1.COLL_ID, T1.APPLIED_TO_CD, T1.COLL_DT, T1.DISB_DT, T1.ADJ_IND, T1.CONCURRENT_IND, T1.DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T1.CRT_TYPE, T1.CST_ID, T1.CRV_ID, T1.CRD_ID, T1.OBG_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_ID, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.OTY_ID, T1.COLL_ADJ_DT, T1.COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T1.CREATED_BY, T1.CREATED_TMST, T1.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T1.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T1.OB_TRN_AMT, T1.DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, T1.DIST_MTD, T1.PGM_APPLD_TO, T1.APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, T1.CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, T1.CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, T1.AE_NOTIFIED_DT, T1.BAL_BEF_COLL, T1.CUM_INT_CHRGD, T1.CUM_INT_COLL_AFT, T1.INT_BAL_AFT_COLL, T1.DISB_TO_AR_IND, T1.MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, T1.COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, T1.CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO, T1.APPLIED_TO_FUT_IND, T1.CSENET_OB_REQ_IND, T1.CSENET_OB_P_DT, T1.CSENET_OB_ADJ_P_DT, T1.CRT_NTC_ADJ_PRC_DT, T1.PGM_ST_APPLD_TO, T2.DEBT_TYP_ID, T2.DEBT_TYP_CD from CKT_OB_TYPE T2 join CKT_COLLECTION T1 on (@crdId = T1.CRD_ID) and (@crvId = T1.CRV_ID) and (@cstId = T1.CST_ID) and (@crtType = T1.CRT_TYPE) and (T1.CREATED_TMST < @createdTmst) and (T2.DEBT_TYP_ID = T1.OTY_ID)

data.name: ReadDebtDetailCollection
data.value: select distinct T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID, T1.OTY_TYPE, T1.OTR_TYPE, T1.DUE_DT, T1.BAL_DUE_AMT, T1.INT_BAL_DUE_AMT, T1.ADC_DT, T1.RETIRED_DT, T1.CVRD_PRD_START_DT, T1.CVD_PRD_END_DT, T1.PRECNVRSN_PGM_CD, T2.COLL_ID, T2.APPLIED_TO_CD, T2.COLL_DT, T2.DISB_DT, T2.ADJ_IND, T2.CONCURRENT_IND, T2.DISB_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T2.CRT_TYPE, T2.CST_ID, T2.CRV_ID, T2.CRD_ID, T2.OBG_ID, T2.CSP_NUMBER, T2.CPA_TYPE, T2.OTR_ID, T2.OTR_TYPE, T2.OTY_ID, T2.COLL_ADJ_DT, T2.COLL_ADJ_PROC_DATE, T2.CREATED_BY, T2.CREATED_TMST, T2.LAST_UPDATED_BY, T2.LAST_UPDATED_TMST, T2.OB_TRN_AMT, T2.DISB_PROC_NEED_IND, T2.DIST_MTD, T2.PGM_APPLD_TO, T2.APPL_TO_ORD_TYP_CD, T2.CRT_NOTICE_REQ_IND, T2.CRT_NOTICE_PROC_DT, T2.AE_NOTIFIED_DT, T2.BAL_BEF_COLL, T2.CUM_INT_CHRGD, T2.CUM_INT_COLL_AFT, T2.INT_BAL_AFT_COLL, T2.DISB_TO_AR_IND, T2.MNL_DIST_RSN_TXT, T2.COL_ADJ_RSN_TXT, T2.CT_ORD_APPLIED_TO, T2.APPLIED_TO_FUT_IND, T2.CSENET_OB_REQ_IND, T2.CSENET_OB_P_DT, T2.CSENET_OB_ADJ_P_DT, T2.CRT_NTC_ADJ_PRC_DT, T2.PGM_ST_APPLD_TO from CKT_CR_DETAIL T4 join CKT_DEBT_DTL T1 join CKT_COLLECTION T2 on (T1.OTY_TYPE = T2.OTY_ID) and (T1.OTR_TYPE = T2.OTR_TYPE) and (T1.OTR_GENERATED_ID = T2.OTR_ID) and (T1.CPA_TYPE = T2.CPA_TYPE) and (T1.CSP_NUMBER = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.OBG_GENERATED_ID = T2.OBG_ID) and (T1.DUE_DT >= @dueDt) and (T2.COLL_DT < @dueDt) and (T2.ADJ_IND <> 'Y') and (T2.CREATED_TMST < @createdTmst) on (T4.CRD_ID = T2.CRD_ID) and (T4.CRV_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRV_ID) and (T4.CST_IDENTIFIER = T2.CST_ID) and (T4.CRT_IDENTIFIER = T2.CRT_TYPE) and (T4.OBLGOR_PRSN_NBR = @oblgorPrsnNbr) order by T1.DUE_DT desc

data.name: ReadObligationTypeCsePersonObligor
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, cast(@cspNumber as char(10)), cast(@cpaType as char(1)) from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId

data.name: UpdateCashReceiptDetail
data.value: update CKT_CR_DETAIL set LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, DISTRIBUTED_AMT = @distributedAmt, COLLAMT_APPL_IND = @collamtApplInd where (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CRD_ID = @crdId)

data.name: UpdateCashReceiptDetailStatHistory
data.value: update CKT_CRDTL_STATHIST set DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate where (CRD_IDENTIFIER = @crdIdentifier) and (CRV_IDENTIFIER = @crvIdentifier) and (CST_IDENTIFIER = @cstIdentifier) and (CRT_IDENTIFIER = @crtIdentifier) and (CDS_IDENTIFIER = @cdsIdentifier) and (CREATED_TIMESTAMP = @createdTimestamp)
